website_summaries.verdict: The Ryka Felicity received a lot of compliments not only for its stylish looks but mostly because of how comfortable it was to wear. Commenters also enjoyed how easy it was to put on and take off because there were no laces that needed to be tied. It was designed as a walking shoe, but that did not stop others from using it as fitness footwear because it was deemed supportive.
pros: A vast majority of users commended the comfort offered by the Ryka Felicity because it helped to relieve pain caused by bunions, arthritis, corns, plantar fasciitis, and other foot issues
A significant number of shoppers thought that the trainer looked cute and went well with their everyday clothing
Droves of testers appreciated the snug fit of the upper and claimed that lengthwise, the footwear ran true to size
Though marketed as a walking shoe, numerous folks wore this model when using the treadmill or the elliptical because it provided the needed support for the said activities
The slip-on style pleased a lot of people especially those with mobility issues that made it hard for them to tie laces or deal with straps
Plenty of wearers enjoyed the lightweight construction of the merchandise because their feet did not feel weighed down
The footgear’s ability to accommodate custom orthotics resonated well with multiple consumers who wanted more cushioning or better arch support
Several individuals noted that the knitted upper kept their feet warm during cold weather
cons: Some purchasers criticized the sole unit because it quickly got dirty and the material wore out fast
The knitted upper was not breathable and caused the feet of a few wearers to become uncomfortably hot

customer_reviews.title: Worn down and Blistered after ONE DAY of walking.
customer_reviews.text: I never have felt inclined to write a review before, but I feel like if I didn’t, someone else would have the same miserable time. I wore these shoes for a couple of days before a trip to break them in a little. I took a trip to DC and decided to wear these shoes. After ten hours of walking, these shoes completely wore down on the bottom and my feet are covered in the most painful uncomfortable blisters. The bottom of the sole is now soft and thin and close to having holes from being so worn down. I am completely disappointed and not satisfied with this shoe. Buyer beware. Will not be buying Ryka products again.
customer_reviews.author: jwozhere

customer_reviews.title: They're Ryka!
customer_reviews.text: Have been a fan of Ryka for years and was looking for something lightweight to take on an upcoming trip. These have my favorite Ryka fit and feel, the flex material that they were using long before everyone else started, and this particular pair was really a deal. They look good with dark wash jeans and a whole lot of items I have in my wardrobe. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ArtistDame1

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes looked great, fit great, but after wearing them for several hours around the house my feet hurt so bad I could hardly walk on them. I am returning them, so sorry because I really liked how they looked and fit. Just something about the shape that doesn't agree with my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as the other Ryka styles I have purchased. Not a good value for the money. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: lisalaw

customer_reviews.title: Started my testing of wool sneakers so far GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I had broken the bones on my foot in 2000 and no matter what shoe I try after hours top of my foot aches because of the ' calcium build up from surgery ' these are only ones who do NOT press on the top of my feet. I did go cheaper and took color green wool but IT WAS AND IS THE BEST CHOICE I LOVE THEM , WILL BE OUT WALKING around neighborhood to see if the sole of the shoes are as bad as some reviews claim. Atleast for past few hours I enjoy them in house.
customer_reviews.author: Mikki

customer_reviews.title: super comfy
customer_reviews.text: i work over 7 hours a day on my feet for my job and these slipons have been feeling great. easy to put on, easy to clean, the soles don't slip. there is a very expensive brand of wool sneakers...these shoes are not a dupe for the style of those expensive shoes but i believe the wool is...very breathable.
customer_reviews.author: mrsgam

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love Them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers felt wonderful the minute I put them on! Very comfortable and the fit is perfect! I can wear them all day! I’m a size 9, but I’ve ordered a 9 1/2, my other sneakers are a 9 and they seem to hurt my feet after awhile when walking for a period of time. With these I have no issues. My daughter said she always orders a half size up in sneakers and boots. Boy what a difference! A great sneaker! Got these in the blue. Love them!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The heel was narrower than other brands I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: sandy foley

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of these several months ago, and when we were homebound (COVID-19 social distancing), they became my favorite shoes. I can wear these all day, and they are perfectly comfortable. And, I love the fact they are slip-ons but look like sneakers. I bought a second pair when I started to worry that the first pair would wear out. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with this pair
customer_reviews.text: I do not care for these as much as my tie up sneakers. I thought they fit well when they first arrived. As I wore them it seemed that they became larger on me. They don’t provide the support I need. I ordered a pair of Ryka slip on for spring. I ordered a half size smaller than I usually wear. We will see how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Dowtin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable and easy to walk in. I have some foot problems , so I was a little hesitant to order. So glad I did. They are light weight and fit great. I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Valley Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fac. and can only wear special shoes with high arch support. These are an inexpensive comfortable shoe that I can wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice shoes. Easy on/off, nice colors, very comfortable for wearing all day. I've worn them sightseeing on vacation all day and my feet are still happy at the end of the day. I own three pairs, in different colors. They are really my "go-to" shoes for casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: The shopper

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Shoe.  I have 3 colors.  True to size for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have grey in a 1/2 size larger so I can wear a sock with them. I wear a 5 w/out a sock. FYI. You can wear these all year round even if they are wool. Soft and comfortable. Lightweight. Pretty good arch support too. I have green, grey and blue.
customer_reviews.author: Suni62

customer_reviews.title: New favorite walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have been my go-to for my daily commute to work. Perfect that you can easily slip them on and off to easily swap into work shoes. As someone that struggles with heel and shin pain I've found these to have great support, and I have no pain after walking in these.
customer_reviews.author: Heather R

customer_reviews.title: No arch support
customer_reviews.text: I love Ryka shoes and was very hopeful that these would be the same as my cross trainers, but they weren't. There is no arch support, which I really need, and this wasn't an issue with my other pair of Rykas. I could remove the insert that came with them and put in a better insole, but not for this price. Sadly returning.
customer_reviews.author: Angie P

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these shoes. This is my second pair and I may buy more. They're very comfortable, easy to put on & take off, I can wear them without socks (yay!), and they're easy to spot clean. I have no complaints. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy21

customer_reviews.title: Just go ahead and buy one in every color... they’re that good!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Bought the grey last winter and liked them so much I got the blue pair this year. Great fit, easy to slip off and on and sooo comfortable. I wear them for walking as well as with jeans and casual attire!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable footwear!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a walking shoe and they are doing great,,,, but now i may buy a second pair to wear with my jeans... they look good and or very comfortable. and i like the fact that they dont tie but still feel snug.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little bigger than expected and have stretched out over time. I may buy a half size smaller next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Byrum

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, good support. Not a long-term, everyday shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I know from experience the bottom of the soles will wear quickly, like all rykä shoes, but they fit do perfectly! Since I know this, I won't consider it a flaw.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shade of gray and VERY comfortable. No bother with laces. Have these in 3 colors now. If you're between sizes, size up.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are also very cool to walk in don't get hot with the fabric they are made out of. The fit is perfect and great arch that is known for in the Ryka shoes that i love
customer_reviews.author: Darlene C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I like these tennis. They are very comfortable. The fit is great. I wear size 8 an ordered 7 1/2. I would recommend. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great for grandma, great for you
customer_reviews.text: This is my 85-year-old grandma’s first pair of tennis shoes and she loves them. She has osteoarthritis and so it’s very difficult to find shoes that are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Made in Monterey

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I walk a lot and these feel great on my feet. My only complaint is that I do wear out the soles.
customer_reviews.author: S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh--I love these shoes--They fit perfectly-- They look great--And so comfortable--What else can I say!! Definitely will be ordering another pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacque M.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable - like the arch
customer_reviews.text: Happy with slip on shoes like these - own several pair. These are nice color and comfortable inside. Would buy again. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: What I. Like

customer_reviews.title: Look good and feel good!
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are easy to slip on and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: SKB

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is light weight, easy to slip on & off. Great shoe for my mother who is in the nursing home. This is her second pair. First pair she has had for over a year & the shoes are still in great shape. Just needed another pair. The fit is good for her narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: JollyJo

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfortable Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Ryka Felicity Shoes. Very comfortable, good fit and I can insert my orthotics inside.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Only for wide feet /ankles
customer_reviews.text: They were a deal , sale . Color is depressing and they " grow " wider with minimal wear.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: They fit
customer_reviews.text: They fit! And that is a huge deal. Good quality for house shoes. I wouldnt go hiking in them but for what I use them for, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: My current favorite shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and great for everyday wear. Easy to slip on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Reine

customer_reviews.title: Great slip on sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these slip in sneakers....especially since it's such a pain to tie my shoes, given that I'm pregnant. I have these in gray and black. I wasn't the blue ones too.
customer_reviews.author: AmiKeto82

customer_reviews.title: Run very large
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, very comfy, but they run really large!! Had to return for 1/2 size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to work. They go well with my khaki color pants and are lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Too small and could bot adjust lace tightness.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that I could not adjust the tightness of the laces.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. Hyland

customer_reviews.title: great fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected (8.5 w) and there was no "breaking-in" time. I was worried that the tongue appears to be high, but it is soft and there is no rubbing. Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: MLM

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Light as a feather, feet don't tire or hurt at all after wearing all day. Bought in 3 colors.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: They fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are just what i was looking for The price was right and they fit perfect. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I wear them a lot. They are comfortable, supportive and just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: tlb

customer_reviews.title: RYKA Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and lightweight. Easily slip on and off. I’m taking them to Italy as my walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: JmcLH

customer_reviews.title: They have good support but they are light weight
customer_reviews.text: I walk a lot but these will probably be for my workouts
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Albrandt

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really comfortable and so I ordered three pairs of them. Is very snug as I have to use a metatarsal and arch support but still feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Reimann

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and provides support!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe that I can wear all day. It provides arch support so my foot doesn't hurt by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: They make a nice clean cut.
customer_reviews.text: I do wish amazon could be able to get ryka’s shoes in extra wide widths. You see, I have a brace that I wear on my left leg, from the foot up to my knee. I just cut the plastic that was on the heel, cut off the tongue that was under the laces, and replaced it with sweatshirt material. TaDa!
customer_reviews.author: Barb A Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Upscale casual style
customer_reviews.text: Fashionable fabric. Not waterproof. Very comfortable if you have bunionettes.
customer_reviews.author: KC Hervey

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable right out of the box, nice looking, ended up buying 2 pair - and want more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AFO SHOE WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Tongue of shoe too large but able to fit AFO and sock on.
customer_reviews.author: chon

customer_reviews.title: Comfort/cute/go
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Great that they have wide sizes. Would like to c them in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Rykas
customer_reviews.text: Since I have narrow & skinny feet...lol...I have relied on Rykas for many years & I keep coming back!!! Love them!!! Plus it has been hard to find a shoe that is comfortable & these are very comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Edra Marsue Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: I live in these
customer_reviews.text: My second pair. Soft, comfy, decent support and I love that they skip on.
customer_reviews.author: s. kaku

customer_reviews.title: Ryka's always fit the same.  Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: They always fit perfectly. I like not having to tie my shoes and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: smead

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe that provides support
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much that I bought five pair. I need a shoe with support and this shoe is perfect. Finally Ryka has a shoe looks good and provides support.
customer_reviews.author: HannaAbbyGracie

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and lightweight. True to size. Ryka never fails!!!
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Love the style and fit
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and easy to put on. Gives the cushion needed
customer_reviews.author: Randee

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED THE SHOES! One of the best I've ever had. I will be buying another color.
customer_reviews.author: grandy

product_meta.title: Ryka Women's Felicity Walking Shoe, Blue, 3 UK
product_meta.description: Slip into style and support from the first step with the felicity walking shoe. A custom heathered knit upper, heel strap, and bungee lacing with all the comfort technology she expects from RYKA makes this shoe perfect for workout out or going out and about.
feature_bullets: Custom heathered knit with molded TPU heel harness strap.
Cushioned, lightweight EVA midsole with dual density heel cradle.
High abrasion grade EVA with rubber pods in high wear areas.
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
